solution_line_template: It will take {total_candies_needed} candies / {production_rate_per_hour} candies/hour = <<{total_candies_needed}/{production_rate_per_hour}={total_hours_needed}>>{total_hours_needed} hours to make all the candy
It will take {total_hours_needed} hours / {hours_per_day} hours/day = <<{total_hours_needed}/{hours_per_day}={total_days_needed}>>{total_days_needed} days to complete the order
